name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_searchWiki
description: Search the Minecraft Wiki for a specific structure, entity, item or block. NOTE: Only use for basic search terms like item/block/structure/entity names - complex queries (like 'loot table of X' or 'how to craft Y') will not work. For best results: 1. Search for the basic entity/structure/etc name first, 2. Then use getPageSummary to see available sections, 3. Finally use getPageSection to get specific section content.

query.description: Search term to find on the Minecraft Wiki.

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_getPageSummary
description: Step 2 of the recommended workflow: After finding a page through search, use this to get both the page summary AND a list of all available sections. This helps determine which specific section to retrieve next using getPageSection.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_getSectionsInPage
description: Retrieves an overview of all sections in the page.

title.description: Title of the page to retrieve sections for.

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_getPageSection
description: Get a specific section from a Minecraft Wiki page. Should be used as step 3 after searching for the page and getting its summary. The section index corresponds to the order of sections on the page, starting with 0 for the main content, 1 for the first section, 2 for the second section, etc.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page

sectionIndex.description: Index of the section to retrieve (0 = main, 1 = first section, 2 = second section, etc.)

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_getPageContent
description: Get the raw wikitext content of a specific Minecraft Wiki page.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page to retrieve the raw wikitext content for.

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_resolveRedirect
description: Resolve a redirect and return the title of the target page.

title.description: Title of the page to resolve the redirect for.

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_listCategoryMembers
description: List all pages that are members of a specific category on the Minecraft Wiki.

category.description: The name of the category to list members from (e.g., 'Items', 'Blocks', 'Entities', 'Structure Blueprints').

limit.description: The maximum number of pages to return (default: 100, max: 500).

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_listAllCategories
description: List all categories in the Minecraft Wiki.

limit.description: The maximum number of categories to return (default: 10, max: 500).

name: Minecraft-Wiki-MCP_MinecraftWiki_getCategoriesForPage
description: Get categories associated with a specific page.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page
